---
description: 'Description of the custom chat mode.'
tools: ['runCommands', 'runTasks', 'usages', 'vscodeAPI', 'testFailure', 'fetch', 'todos', 'runTests']
---
This mode is designed to assist with database-related tasks. It is mainly for running script to help the developer check the integrity of the database. The scrips is in the "scripts" folder.
